name: Pogo
description: Hold on tight it's time to bounce! Pogo is a goofy yet challenging 3D physics platformer that will make you laugh with joy and cry with frustration.
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: Windows 7 SP1+ 处理器: 2.4 GHz 内存: 2 GB RAM 图形: Onboard Intel HD 4600 DirectX 版本: 9.0c 存储空间: 需要 300 MB 可用空间 声卡: DirectX9.0 compatible sound card
